text: David Sive (September 22, 1922 - March 12, 2014) was an American lawyer, environmentalist, and professor of environmental law. He is recognized as a pioneer in the field of United States environmental law, and is credited with helping create the field of environmental law. He was born in the Brooklyn borough of New York City, New York. Sive died on March 12, 2014 in West Orange, New Jersey. He was 91 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * David Sive at the Pace Law School website Category:1922 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:American teachers Category:Educators from New York City
title: David Sive
